title: Notable Experience
text: President Associated Student Union - East Los Angeles College

title: Monique Allyson Hernandez
text:
Hi, welcome to my page!
I am a proud Gaucho, graduating class of 20225 this spring and will be departing happily with a B.S. in Environmental Studies. I am an advocate for sustainability and currently practice a vegan lifestyle which is integrated into my work through research and creative projects. Utilizing both my scientific and humanities background, I combine research with documentaries, poetic writings, and podcast. On my free time, I enjoy spending time in nature, reading, cuddling with my dog as well as socializing with my friends and family.

title: Notable Experience

text: Student Activites Student Worker - East Los Angeles College

title: Notable Experience
text:
Self-Publish Author - Poetry
In 2020, during the pandemic, I indulged in writing poetry which accumulated into 50 original poems. In 2022, I edited and published the poetry collection through Amazon as well as utilized social media. This was a self-guided publishing and marketing journey for my own passion and work.

title: About Me
text: Graduating Spring 2025, I will be departing from UCSB with a B.S. in Environmental Studies. I am an advocate for sustainability and currently practice a vegan lifestyle which is integrated into my work through research and creative projects. Aside from my scientific background, I combine research with documentaries, poetic writings, and podcast. On my free time, I enjoy spending time in nature, reading, and socializing with friends and family.
